channel.title: mserv: Self-host a Minecraft Server on Quinton's Repository
channel.description: Recent content in mserv: Self-host a Minecraft Server on Quinton's Repository

item.title: mserv Release v0.8
item.author: dropatuningmetal@gmail.com (Quinton Jasper)
item.description: About This article discusses version 0.8, as well as all minor updates (eg. 0.8.2). There is a chance that some of this information will not be valid after some time. But, my goal is to keep the basic functionality extremely similar, if not the same, throughout the lifetime of this project mserv’s main function is to act as an abstraction layer on top of the official Mojang server binary. In other words, it shoots commands to a different program so that you don’t have to.
item.dc:creator: Quinton Jasper
